actions.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate regarding the effectiveness of the AMBER plan in responding to child abductions.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the AMBER Plan (America's Missing: Broadcast Emergency Response Plan, a partnership between law enforcement agencies and media officials that assists law enforcement, parents, and local communities to respond immediately to the most serious child abduction cases) is a powerful tool in fighting child abductions that should be used in U.S. communities.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate regarding the effectiveness of the AMBER plan in responding to child abductions.
